## Model Performance
#### Model performance will be measured by using Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE).

### Part 1: Predict Kickstarter Project Will Fail 

```{r echo=FALSE}
dat <- matrix(c("Naive Model", "0.4802372"), ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
colnames(dat) <- c("Model","RMSE Value")
knitr::kable(dat)
```

### Part 2: Predict Kickstarter Project Will be at least 20% Funded

```{r echo=FALSE}
dat <- matrix(c("Naive Model", "1.918470"), ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
colnames(dat) <- c("Model","RMSE Value")
knitr::kable(dat)
```
